next_state: -= Kitchen =- You're not going to believe this, but you've just entered a kitchen. You make out an opened fridge. The fridge contains a fried carrot, a lettuce and a parsley. Huh, weird. You see an oven. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing. Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a table. On the table you see a cookbook. You make out a counter. You wonder idly who left that here. The counter is vast. On the counter you can make out a roasted yellow apple, a yellow bell pepper, a red apple, a tomato, a raw yellow potato and a knife. You can make out a stove. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. There is an open frosted-glass door leading south. There is an exit to the west. > -= Kitchen =-0/7
